title: GEL ZA PRHANJE IN ŠAMPON 2V1 FRUITY, SUBRINA KIDS, 250ML

product-info.opis: Gel za prhanje in šampon Fruity nežno očisti in neguje otroško kožo in lase.

ingredient-information.sestavine: AQUA, SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, DISODIUM LAURYL SULFOSUCCINATE, GLYCERIN, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, GLYCERYL OLEATE, PARFUM, POLYQUATERNIUM-7, SODIUM BENZOATE, LAURETH-2, PANTHENOL, SODIUM CITRATE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, CITRIC ACID, POLYQUATERNIUM-10, SODIUM SALICYLATE, HYDROLYZED WHEAT PROTEIN, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, PERSEA GRATISSIMA FRUIT EXTRACT, STYRENE/ACRYLATES COPOLYMER.
